text.section: Notwithstanding KRS 21A.160, any person violating any provision of KRS 21A.300 shall, upon conviction, be guilty of a Class A misdemeanor.
The Kentucky Supreme Court may discipline any attorney who violates any provision of KRS 21A.300.
A penalty may be imposed on an attorney pursuant to subsection (1) of this section, subsection (2) of this section, or both subsections.

law.history: Amended 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 4, effective June 24, 2015. -- Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 69, sec. 2, effective June 8, 2011. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 192, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1996.
